mapper.insert: insert into works_cllection (portfolio_id, portfolio_name, pstatus, pcreate_time, pupdate_time, poreditor, portfolio_updateman, portfolio_spare) values (#{portfolioId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{portfolioName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pcreateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{pupdateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{poreditor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{portfolioUpdateman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{portfolioSpare,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update works_cllection set portfolio_name = #{portfolioName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pstatus = #{pstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pcreate_time = #{pcreateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, pupdate_time = #{pupdateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, poreditor = #{poreditor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, portfolio_updateman = #{portfolioUpdateman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, portfolio_spare = #{portfolioSpare,jdbcType=INTEGER} where portfolio_id = #{portfolioId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select portfolio_id, portfolio_name, pstatus, pcreate_time, pupdate_time, poreditor, portfolio_updateman, portfolio_spare from works_cllection where portfolio_id = #{portfolioId,jdbcType=BIGINT} order by portfolio_spare
select portfolio_id, portfolio_name, pstatus, pcreate_time, pupdate_time, poreditor, portfolio_updateman, portfolio_spare from works_cllection order by portfolio_spare
